SEARCH
Package com.teamx.demo.controller

Class TeamController

java.lang.Object
com.teamx.demo.controller.TeamController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/teams") public class TeamController extends Object
REST controller for managing teams. Provides endpoints to create teams, retrieve teams by contest or user, get captain/vice-captain, and get combined contest/team details.

    • createTeam

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> createTeam(@RequestBody Team team)
      Creates a new team and reduces the spots left for the associated contest.
      Parameters:
      team - the team to create
      Returns:
      the created team

    • getTeamsByContestId

      @GetMapping("/contest/{contestId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getTeamsByContestId(@PathVariable String contestId)
      Retrieves all teams for a given contest ID.
      Parameters:
      contestId - the contest ID
      Returns:
      list of teams for the contest

    • getTeamsByUserEmail

      @GetMapping("/user/{userEmail}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getTeamsByUserEmail(@PathVariable String userEmail)
      Retrieves all teams created by a user.
      Parameters:
      userEmail - the user's email
      Returns:
      list of teams created by the user

    • getTeamCaptain

      @GetMapping("/{teamId}/captain") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getTeamCaptain(@PathVariable String teamId)
      Retrieves the captain of a team.
      Parameters:
      teamId - the team ID
      Returns:
      the captain of the team, or 404 if not found

    • getTeamViceCaptain

      @GetMapping("/{teamId}/viceCaptain") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getTeamViceCaptain(@PathVariable String teamId)
      Retrieves the vice-captain of a team.
      Parameters:
      teamId - the team ID
      Returns:
      the vice-captain of the team, or 404 if not found

    • getContestAndTeamDetails

      @GetMapping("/combined") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getContestAndTeamDetails(@RequestParam String userEmail)
      Retrieves combined contest and team details for all contests a user has joined.
      Parameters:
      userEmail - the user's email
      Returns:
      list of contests with their associated teams for the user
